name: Into The Dark (itch) (dodomino14)
description:
Into the Dark is a short tech demo of a first person immersive stealth game I put together for my CS capstone. 

Explore the base of a cult mysteriously taken over by orcs. Use magic, hand-to-hand combat, and a trusty bow and arrow to clear the infesting orcs.

This is a tech demo, so there isn't much of a mechanical arc or progression, and the ending is quite a big disappointment, but feel free to play around. There are quite a lot of mechanics, from spellcasting to parrying and hiding under tables. 

Game was built in Unity
